Macon.WIHB (AM):
WIHB (1280 AM) is a radio station licensed to Macon, Georgia, USA. The station is currently owned by iHeartMedia, Inc. (formerly Clear Channel Communications) and licensed to AMFM Radio Licenses, LLC.


== History ==
The station went on the air as WIBB on November 14, 1948. On March 1, 1993, the call sign was changed to WKXK but was changed back to WIBB on November 29, 1994.
